BootstrapTextblock.Title: You need to log in first

Paragraph.Headline: First you need to log in

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
Before you can edit content with OpenCms, you need to log in. The default login information is displayed in the blue box on the left.

There are 2 options: 

Log in through this demo website.
This is a simple custom login dialog that is part of the demo.

Log in with the default OpenCms login dialog.
This the native log in dialog with more options. 

After you have logged in, come back to this page to continue the tutorial.
